channel.title: Help changing the amount d claws hits
channel.description: ok i got the d claws spec working. it hits 4 times and everything. but it only hits like 0-0-14-20 or 0-0-0-14 the numbers are random but i cant get it to hit over 2 times. can someone help me?

item.title: Help changing the amount d claws hits
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

[quote=“dillingo, post:2, topic:285643”]I’m not sure if this will work, but you can try going to your item.cfg, search for dragon_claws. The first number is the buying value (in shops), the second is the selling value (in shops), the third is the alching value. The next 5 are the attack stats, then the next 5 are the defence stats, then next one is for strength, and the last one for prayer. Try raising the attack numbers and the strength number. I’m not sure if this will help with your special attack but you can try. For example, here are my stats for dragon claws.

item = 13664	Dragon_Claws	Dragon_claws	750000000	750000000	750000000	34	75	53	74	23	13	26	7	5	13	115	20

That would prob not work, it is how you coded it, a lot of people have that problem, a lot of tutorials on it… www.google.com

Read full topic
item.source: Help changing the amount d claws hits
